name: Content Creators

Notes float over any app.
Record professional content with your script at your fingertips.

faq.question: Does the teleprompter show in my recordings?
faq.answer: No! CueCard floats above your camera app. Your viewers only see you, not your script or notes.

faq.question: Can I use it with Instagram and TikTok?
faq.answer: Yes! CueCard floats above any app including Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, and your native camera.

faq.question: Can I control the scroll speed?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Adjust the auto-scroll speed to match your natural reading pace.

faq.question: Is CueCard free?
faq.answer: Yes! CueCard is completely free and available for iOS and Android.
